articles.title: A Fasting-Style Diet Seems to Result in Dynamic Changes to Human Brains - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Scientists looking to tackle our ongoing obesity crisis have made an important discovery: Intermittent calorie restriction leads to significant changes both in the gut and the brain, which may open up new options for maintaining a healthy weight.

articles.title: The Most Scientifically Accurate Sci-Fi Movies, According To NASA - bgr.com
articles.description: Not all sci-fi movies are like "2012." According to NASA scientists, films like Gattaca and even Jurassic Park are surprisingly accurate scientifically.
